meanings.sent1: The donnybrooks in the schoolyard were quickly stopped by the teachers.
meanings.sent2: The town had a reputation for rowdy donnybrooks every Saturday night.
meanings.sent3: During the family reunion, Uncle Joe jokingly challenged everyone to a donnybrooks.
meanings.sent4: The political debate turned into a verbal donnybrooks between the candidates.
meanings.sent5: The donnybrooks between rival gangs painted a grim picture of the neighborhood.

meanings.sent1: The siblings often got into donnybrooks over who got to use the TV.
meanings.sent2: The donnybrooks at the town hall meeting made it hard to hear the speakers.
meanings.sent3: The donnybrooks between the neighbors about the property line were endless.
meanings.sent4: The donnybrooks in the courtroom echoed through the halls of justice.
meanings.sent5: The donnybrooks between the fans of rival teams added excitement to the game.
